data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=DXFQOEdVVaYQ7kNvgH1eRUn&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&gid=AOnf7KINYVPBwTK4CfD3UET&oh=00_AYBZhfhv9_RLKpauKBE0GbOsxc4MUiISjW2LiomcYljmyA&oe=66AF41CC)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=u2D1nWffCI4Q7kNvgGIukr9&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&gid=AOnf7KINYVPBwTK4CfD3UET&oh=00_AYApMR2t6kOMFwW79QnWbm2IJqHrNt9yNXvqftlyNty_xw&oe=66AF3FDF)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=rq789qlkFpwQ7kNvgFZ6FCy&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&gid=AOnf7KINYVPBwTK4CfD3UET&oh=00_AYC0n3-pJSiFu2yMun6iAH3YyeAEh4Tmt2sT31HuZYBC2Q&oe=66AF5D71)
